description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.

title: THE GREAT ALONE
author: Kristin Hannah
description: A former prisoner of war moves his family to Alaska.

title: THE PRESIDENT IS MISSING
author: Bill Clinton and James Patterson
description: President Jonathan Duncan takes on adversaries at home and abroad.

title: SPYMASTER
author: Brad Thor
description: The 18th book in the Scot Harvath series. As a war looms, a counterterrorism operative takes on a new role his own way.

title: THE PERFECT COUPLE
author: Elin Hilderbrand
description: A body is found in Nantucket Harbor hours before a picture-perfect wedding.

title: THE OUTSIDER
author: Stephen King
description: A detective investigates a seemingly wholesome member of the community when an 11-year-old boy’s body is found.

title: ALL WE EVER WANTED
author: Emily Giffin
description: A scandal sends members of two Nashville families into chaos.

title: THERE THERE
author: Tommy Orange
description: A multigenerational story exploring the plight of the urban Native American.

title: THE DEATH OF MRS. WESTAWAY
author: Ruth Ware
description: A tarot card reader mistakenly receives an inheritance letter and attends the funeral of the deceased.

title: WHEN LIFE GIVES YOU LULULEMONS
author: Lauren Weisberger
description: Emily Charlton plans a comeback from the suburbs.

title: THE FALLEN
author: David Baldacci
description: Amos Decker puts his talents toward solving a string of murders.

title: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS
author: Lisa Wingate
description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.

title: TOM CLANCY LINE OF SIGHT
author: Mike Maden
description: Jack Ryan Jr. risks his life to protect a woman in a country on the brink of civil war.

title: SOMETHING IN THE WATER
author: Catherine Steadman
description: A documentary filmmaker and an investment banker must decide whether they should protect a secret.

title: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE
author: Celeste Ng
description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.

title: SHELTER IN PLACE
author: Nora Roberts
description: Survivors of a mass shooting outside a mall in Portland, Me., develop different coping mechanisms.

title: THE LAST TIME I LIED
author: Riley Sager
description: A painter is in danger when she returns to the summer camp where some of her childhood friends disappeared.
